misuse.notes: employees at City County Alcohol Drug Program (CCADP) violated federal law when they notified law enforcement that they had found a used syringe in her possession when she came to them, seeking help.

internal.notes: Though it runs counter to procedure at other drug treatment centers in the state, notifying law enforcement has become established practice in the handful of similar cases that arise every year at the City County Alcohol Drug Program (CCADP) in Rapid City.

asset.notes: employees at City County Alcohol Drug Program (CCADP) violated federal law when they notified law enforcement that they had found a used syringe in her possession when she came to them, seeking help.

confidentiality.notes: employees at City County Alcohol Drug Program (CCADP) violated federal law when they notified law enforcement that they had found a used syringe in her possession when she came to them, seeking help.

discovery_notes: once patient got out of jail, she sued CCADP for HIPAA violation
summary: Woman sues Pennington County authorities for alleged violation of her civil rights  a woman is suing Pennington County because employees at City County Alcohol Drug Program (CCADP) violated federal law when they notified law enforcement that they had found a used syringe in her possession when she came to them, seeking help.
